title: "Artificial intelligence threatens wages, not jobs so far, says ECB report"
excerpt: "The rapid adoption of artificial intelligence could reduce wages, but so far is creating, not destroying jobs, especially for the young and highly-skilled, research published by the European Central Bank showed on Tuesday."
